FILE: cm101365v11.0.txt
DYAD: VENEZUELA - RUSSIA/USSR
RIVALRY: RIV288
DISPUTE(S): MID2922 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170720
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170729

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2922 

TERRMID: MID2922 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2922 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2922 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2922 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2922 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2922 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: MID2922 from MID-B data, this MID has date range 6/17/1968. From NYT 6/18/1968, Venezuela seized a USSR ship that entered its territorial waters and refused to stop after warnings. The ship was later released by Venezuela. Coded not maritime because the maritime border was not disputed. 

ISLMID: MID2922 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2922 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2922 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2922 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2922 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2922 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2922 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2922 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2922 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2922 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

NYT 6/18/1968
